name: Step Sequencer
description: A 16-step note sequencer based on the Expert Sleepers FH-2. Outputs CVs and/or MIDI. Each step has pitch, velocity, and modulation values. Features repeats, ratchets, ties, and glide. Includes 32 sequence snapshots and randomization functions.

parameters.name: Sequence
parameters.description: Selects the current sequence (1-32).

parameters.name: Start
parameters.description: The first step to play (1-16). Reset jumps here.

parameters.name: End
parameters.description: The last step to play (1-16).

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: Sequencer direction.

parameters.name: Permutation
parameters.description: Sequencer permutation.

parameters.name: Gate type
parameters.description: Sets the gate output type.

parameters.name: Gate length
parameters.description: Sets the gate length if type is ' of clock'.

parameters.name: Trigger length
parameters.description: Sets the gate length if type is 'Trigger'.

parameters.name: Glide
parameters.description: Sets the glide time for tied notes.

parameters.name: Pitch
parameters.description: Sets the step pitch (MIDI note number).

parameters.name: Division
parameters.description: Sets the step repeat or ratchet count.

parameters.name: Pattern
parameters.description: Sets which substeps are on or off (binary pattern).

parameters.name: Ties
parameters.description: Sets which substeps are ties (binary pattern).

parameters.name: Velocity
parameters.description: Sets the step velocity.

parameters.name: Mod
parameters.description: Sets the step modulation value.

parameters.name: Mute
parameters.description: Probability that the step will be muted.

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: Probability that the step will be skipped.

parameters.name: Reset
parameters.description: Probability that the step causes a reset.

parameters.name: Repeat
parameters.description: Probability that the step will be repeated.

parameters.name: Randomise
parameters.description: Trigger randomisation of steps between Start and End.

parameters.name: Randomise what
parameters.description: What to randomise.

parameters.name: Note distribution
parameters.description: Probability distribution for random note pitches.

parameters.name: Min note
parameters.description: Minimum random note pitch (Uniform distribution).

parameters.name: Max note
parameters.description: Maximum random note pitch (Uniform distribution).

parameters.name: Mean note
parameters.description: Mean random note pitch (Normal distribution).

parameters.name: Note deviation
parameters.description: Note pitch deviation (Normal distribution).

parameters.name: Min repeat
parameters.description: Minimum repeat count if step is a repeat.

parameters.name: Max repeat
parameters.description: Maximum repeat count if step is a repeat.

parameters.name: Min ratchet
parameters.description: Minimum ratchet count if step is a ratchet.

parameters.name: Max ratchet
parameters.description: Maximum ratchet count if step is a ratchet.

parameters.name: Note probability
parameters.description: Probability that a random note will be on.

parameters.name: Tie probability
parameters.description: Probability that a random step will be a tie.

parameters.name: Accent probability
parameters.description: Probability that a random step will be accented.

parameters.name: Repeat probability
parameters.description: Probability that a random step will be a repeat.

parameters.name: Ratchet probability
parameters.description: Probability that a random step will be a ratchet.

parameters.name: Unaccented velocity
parameters.description: Velocity for unaccented random steps (accented = 127).

parameters.name: Clock input
parameters.description: Bus for clock input.

parameters.name: Reset input
parameters.description: Bus for reset input.

parameters.name: Reset mode
parameters.description: Mode for the reset input.

parameters.name: Pitch output
parameters.description: Output bus for pitch CV.

parameters.name: Pitch output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for pitch CV output.

parameters.name: Gate output
parameters.description: Output bus for gate.

parameters.name: Gate output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for gate output.

parameters.name: Velocity output
parameters.description: Output bus for velocity CV.

parameters.name: Velocity output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for velocity output.

parameters.name: Mod output
parameters.description: Output bus for modulation CV.

parameters.name: Mod output mode
parameters.description: Add/Replace mode for modulation output.

parameters.name: Sequence CV input
parameters.description: Bus to select the sequence via CV.

parameters.name: Sequence trigger input
parameters.description: Bus for sequence select trigger.

parameters.name: Sequence change mode
parameters.description: How sequence CV changes sequences: 'Switch' or 'Load'.

parameters.name: Follow MIDI clock
parameters.description: Sets whether the sequencer follows MIDI clock.

parameters.name: Divisor
parameters.description: Sets the clock divisor when following MIDI clock.

parameters.name: MIDI channel (out)
parameters.description: Sets the output MIDI channel.

parameters.name: Output to breakout
parameters.description: Enables MIDI output to the breakout.

parameters.name: Output to Select Bus
parameters.description: Enables MIDI output to the Select Bus.

parameters.name: Output to USB
parameters.description: Enables MIDI output to USB.

parameters.name: MIDI channel (in)
parameters.description: MIDI channel for programming pitches (0=off).
